properties.body:
EGYPT TO ITALY.
VESSEL, UNKNOWN PERSONS ON BOARD, UNREPORTED
EGYPT TO ITALY. VESSEL POSSIBLY SUNK 11 NOV, 
PERSONS IN RED BOAT. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 06 5924145
OR 5924409, FAX: 39 06 5922737 OR 59084793.
